tool_description: Rugby fixtures, results, standings and live match coverage from around the world of rugby.
name: Rugby Live Data
title: Rugby Live Data

api_list.name: Fixtures and Results By Team
api_list.description: All fixtures and results for a given team
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-results-by-team/6167"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-results-by-team/{team_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fixtures By Team By Season
api_list.description: Fixtures and results for a given team within a given season, across all competitions they play in.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-by-team-by-season/6167/2023"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-by-team-by-season/{team_id}/{season_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fixtures By Date
api_list.description: Returns fixtures and results by date. When date is not present, defaults to today.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-by-date/2023-02-04"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-by-date/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Match
api_list.description: Detailed match data given a valid match_id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/match/3195835"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/match/{match_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fixtures By Team
api_list.description:
Lists only upcoming/in play fixtures for a given team. 

**Note** it will not list any results, so when a match reaches result status it drops off. Use Fixtures and Results By Team OR Fixtures  And Results by Team by Season endpoint for this functionality.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures-by-team/9317"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugby-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Teams By Competition Season
api_list.description: Lists teams for a given competition and season

print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fixtures

api_list.name: Standings
api_list.description: Lists season standings for a given comp_id and season_id combination.
